title: Imam Khataev
text: Imam Abdulayevich Khataev (; born 31 August 1994) is a Russian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202020%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20light%20heavyweight">men's light heavyweight event</a> at the <a href="2020%20Summer%20Olympics">2020 Summer Olympics</a>, where he was defeated by Briton <a href="Benjamin%20Whittaker">Benjamin Whittaker</a> by a score of 4–1 in the semifinals.
